destination.shortDescription: Hungary is a landlocked country in Central Europe, known for its rich cultural heritage and architectural landmarks. Its capital, Budapest, is famed for its scenic Danube River views and numerous thermal baths.
destination.shortHistory: Founded in 896 AD, Hungary became a significant power in Central Europe, reaching a peak during the Austro-Hungarian Empire. Post-World War I, it underwent significant territorial changes and played varied roles in European history.

program.shortDescriptionOfProgram: Explore the hidden world under Budapest with a guided caving tour. Explore the hidden world under Budapest with a guided caving tour.

Hike to the top of Gellért Hill to see the famous Citadella and enjoy panoramic views of the city. Hike to the top of Gellért Hill to see the famous Citadella and enjoy panoramic views of the city.
